The Body Golem is one of the golems found in the Ruins of Camdozaal. It can be found by awakening the rubble lying in the section north-east of the bank chest.

When you walk away from an awakened golem without killing it, it will disintegrate as if it died, without dropping any loot.

Body golems are notable for dropping the Barronite guard, needed for construction of the Barronite mace, and for dropping Body cores, used in Runecraft.

Contents

  • 1 Location
  • 2 Safespotting

    • 3.1 Tertiary

Location[edit | edit source]

Location Levels Members Spawns Map
Ruins of Camdozaal506Maplink

Safespotting[edit | edit source]

It is possible to safespot the golems using Magic or Ranged (and possibly halberd). To safespot the golem, awaken one of the south-eastern golems and run behind the big rock in the north east part of the room. Then go to the tile above the rubble as shown (it must be this exact tile otherwise you will walk close to the golem). If done properly, you should move two tiles east but not approach the golem's melee range.

Body Golem Safe-spotting setup
You must move to this exact tile in order to safespot the golem

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

Golems from the Ruins of Camdozaal will now drop rune essence in the form of bank notes instead of unnoted rune essence.
